title: The Mandie Collection, Volume 8
description: Mandie enthusiasts and new Mandie fans will love volumes seven and eight of the MANDIE COLLECTION, following Mandie and her friends through the Thanksgiving and Christmas holidays and beyond, from her home in North Carolina to New York City to Florida. Volume eight features "Mandie and the Long Good-bye "(#30), " Mandie and the Buried Stranger "(#31), " "and" Mandie and the Seaside Rendezvous "(#32).
author: Lois Gladys Leppard
